name: rottentomatoes_compare_movies
description: Compare Rotten Tomatoes scores for multiple movies by searching and extracting their Tomatometer and audience scores side by side.

detailSteps.code: const first = document.querySelector('search-page-media-row, [class*="search-result"]:first-child, [data-qa="search-result"]:first-child'); if (!first) return { title: '', tomatometer: '', audience_score: '', year: '', url: '' }; const titleEl = first.querySelector('a[data-qa="info-name"], [class*="title"] a, a[slot="title"]'); const yearEl = first.querySelector('[data-qa="info-year"], span[slot="year"]'); const tomatometerEl = first.querySelector('rt-text[slot="criticsScore"], [data-qa="tomatometer"]'); const audienceEl = first.querySelector('rt-text[slot="audienceScore"], [data-qa="audience-score"]'); const linkEl = first.querySelector('a[data-qa="info-name"], a[href*="/m/"]'); return { title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', year: yearEl ? yearEl.textContent.trim() : '', tomatometer: tomatometerEl ? tomatometerEl.textContent.trim() : '', audience_score: audienceEl ? audienceEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? (linkEl.href.startsWith('http') ? linkEl.href : 'https://www.rottentomatoes.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href')) : '' }
detailSteps.name: movie_score
detailSteps.label: Extract top result score
